page.title: 07LIVING IN PENTIRE
page.content: We spoke to 2 people to find out what a usual day was like. One has lived in this area for 2 years and likes it a lot; she is a{Nanny}who looks after the owner's children at the Hotel St. Rumons. She likes her job because it involves children and it is permanent. At sometime she would like to work in a Nursery with very young children. In her spare time she helps a Girl Guide Company. She worries about the amount of unemployment in Newquay at present. A second has been a{Hotel {Owner}for 19 years, been in the trade for 30 years and still enjoys his job. He rises at 6.00a.m. and at 6.45 he runs with his dog, swims at Porth Joke then goes home for break-fast. During the day he makes sure every- thing runs smoothly. At 6.15pm the bar opens; from 7.00pm to 8.00pm dinner is served. His day ends at 12.30a.m.
